name: Smashimals
description:
Smashimals is a goofy voxel art driving game that tests your reflexes as you attempt to smash into cute little animals.

Play as Floyd, an employee at Carl's Road Kill Cafe, as he collects tasty morsels for the 6 pm dinner rush.

You have 60 seconds. How many can you smash?

--------------------------------------------

LOST RELIC GAME JAM SUBMISSION

For our submission, we explore the theme of Connection by creating a game mechanic that holds our voxel animal characters together until they are hilariously blown apart.

--------------------------------------------

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

  • Up Arrow: Forward
  • Down Arrow: Reverse
  • Left Arrow: Left 
  • Right Arrow: Right 
  • Shift: Boost

--------------------------------------------

MUSIC

Cheerful 2 - La Spensierata (Polka) Loop

--------------------------------------------

CREATORS

Hi. 

We’re Calin & Chad. And, we make games. Well, we’ve made a few games.

We’re two 30-somethings from Calgary, AB.

Follow us on Instagram @mrpredictablestudios

Sign up to our newsletter to get exclusive emails, game updates, and bonus materials.
